description:
Today we meet Chawoo. A ghost that happens to be Cocoloo`s steward. A famous artist comes to the academy to look for his next inspiration, his hunt for a model upsets everyone over being rejected. Then he chooses Cocoloo as his model. In the end its also discovered that she too is a Platinum Princess Candidate.
Source: tv.com

titles.title: Kirameite, Watashi no Naka no Watashi
きらめいて, 私の中のワタシ
